name: Post Apocalypse Folkrace Level Design
description:
This level was made in Unreal Engine 4 as a part of a university assignment in level design. Built for a hypothetical game combining elements of racing and battle royale.

First time building something in 3D and using UE4.

Get to all checkpoints before the time runs out!

Controls: 

  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Handbrake: SPACE
  • Reset Flipped Car: R
  • Quit Game: ESC
  • Menu Navigation: MOUSE
